name: Dwellink: War of the Nine
storyline: Kohara is under siege. The Great Link suddenly opened portals between its nine worlds, allowing Dwellers - unique creatures inhabiting each - to rampage unchecked. Within six months, they pushed humanity to the edge. Worlds teeter on the brink of collapse, as war, famine, and fanaticism spread like wildfire. In the middle of this is Gero, a young student of So-Hamon, who doesn't know that he will play a crucial role in stopping the end times.
summary: Dwellink is a dark fantasy creature collector RPG, set in a universe under siege. The Great Link opened portals connecting the Nine Worlds of Kohara, allowing ferocious Dwellers to spread chaos and destruction. It's up to you to discover the source of the cataclysm and end it once and for all!
